commit 2e6dde66ce1f846860afcf18b51c9f516d4dc120
Author: BoD <BoD@JRAF.org>
Date:   Sat Nov 8 23:31:30 2014 +0100

Gradelification.
iml files updated from Android Studio
common.iml and handheld.iml updated by Android Studio
Renamed FRCSchedulre to FRCWidgetScheduler and ScheduleUtil to FRCWearScheduler
Renamed WearCommHelper to FRCWearCommHelper and AndroidWearService to FRCAndroidWearService
Specify both version-name and version-code in the buil.properties file
Moved wear shared preference logic to FRCWearPreferenceListener.java
Moved most android wear code to the wear flavor
Update the handheld deploy task to copy the apks for each flavor
Remove the Google Play Services dependency from the FOSS flavor
Added BoD to the about screen credits
Use manifest merging to include the gms meta-data element only in the wear flavor.
Remove unnecessary manifest attributes from the wear flavor
Don't include the wearable apk inside the foss handheld apk
Show the weekday in the wearable notification
The versionCode and versionName are no longer build parameters
Fixed bug where widget disappeared after upgrade, on some launchers
